name: SOCOM U.S. Navy SEALs
summary: SOCOM U.S. Navy SEALs is a tactical third-person shooter video game developed by Zipper Interactive and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for the PlayStation 2. SOCOM was released on August 27, 2002, and it is one of the earliest titles for PS2's online service in North America.
info:
• 中文名: 海豹突击队
  • 发行: Sony Interactive Entertainment
  • 平台: PS2
  • 游戏类型: TPS / Tactical shooter
  • 游戏引擎: Kinetica
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2002年8月27日
